imgDesc.text: Mysterious devices found within the ancient ruins that are larger than the Rune Mechanisms. Can generate energy that can ablate sand piles when unlocked. When attacked, one such device can change the direction in which it projects this energy.

Mysterious devices found within the ancient ruins that are larger than the Rune Mechanisms. Can generate energy that can ablate sand piles when unlocked. When attacked, one such device can change the direction in which it projects this energy.
